text: Deutsche Schule La Paz () is a German international school in La Paz, Bolivia."Kontakt" (Archive)/"Contacto" (Archive). Deutsche Schule La Paz. Retrieved on 23 March 2015. "Avenida Alexander # 100 Achumani Casilla 605 – 4442 La Paz, Bolivien" The school serves Kindergarten through grade 12 (Sekundarstufe/Secundaria 12). The school was founded on 10 May 1923."Geschichte" (Archive)/"Historia" (Archive). Deutsche Schule La Paz. Retrieved on 23 March 2015. ==See also== * Ethnic Germans in Bolivia ==References== ==External links== * Deutsche Schule La Paz * Deutsche Schule La Paz La Paz Category:International schools in La Paz Category:Educational institutions established in 1923 Category:1923 establishments in Bolivia
title: Deutsche Schule La Paz
